en: Those born of shadow are\nforever doomed to serve\nthe light.

This corrupted light must
be snuffed out. Those born of
shadow have devine right to
fufill this task.
When the light is stained; dim;\ncorrupted. Those born to shadow\nare bound to act.

At long last I have returned,
o' ${tr_char_lightlord}. Though your
light dim in the far reaches,
I follow...

I've spent whatbea millenia
to be at present, Shadowed One!
You will not keep me from my
journey's end!

Blessed o' ${tr_char_lightlord}, I pray
to thee this day for your
strength to return
-- hmm?
Shadowed One! How dare you\ndefile His divine house!
Hail and well met Shadowkin.\nThink Mother would entrust\njust one child to this task?
